ai-anya-e0605n0:0_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-anya-e0605n0:4_0: And he would likewise for the sake of the debates and make offerings dedicated to the gods of the Thirty-Three after immersing himself in samādhi.
ai-anya-e0605n0:5_0: After being intent on awakening, the supreme purity,
ai-anya-e0605n0:6_0: after doing suffering, they experience suffering because of fear.
ai-anya-e0605n0:8_0: I don’t look for all around the whole world—
ai-anya-e0605n0:9_0: I’m not content with what’s good and whole of all good qualities, produced in the heavens,
ai-anya-e0605n0:10_0: Though my dream listening to the Holy One!
